JOB DESCRIPTION: Role : Senior Software Engineer - React.jsLocation : Indore / RemoteExperience : 3-6 years Qualification : BE / BTec/ MCA / MTec / ME / Msc.Mandatory Skills : React, Javascript, Web Api, Redux/Mobx/Flux, DatabaseTechnical Skills :- Minimum 2+ years of strong real-time experience in developing React JS and JavaScript-based applications.- Expert in React JS frameworks and concepts (like Components, Props, State (Redux/Mobx/Flux), Router, Hooks, etc.)- Experience with JS unit test frameworks (like Jest and Enzyme)- Good knowledge of REST web services and open API design- Experience with common front-end development tools (such as Babel, Webpack, Parcel, ESLint, Flow, NPM, etc.)- Experience with NodeJs and Next JS will be a plus.Job Responsibilities :- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.- Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements.- Creating cross-browser compliant front-end code- Support site rollouts and be available to resolve site issues- Develop industry and product technical expertiseSoft Skills :- Ability to work with a cross-functional team.- Must have good communication skills.

EDUCATION.PG: MS/M.Sc(Science) in Any Specialization, M.Tech in Any Specialization, MCA in Computers
